title: Everglades National Park: Safety & Regulations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Brochures     Safety & Regulations              Safety & Regulations               Boating Regulations              Fishing Regulations Fishing regulations may change every year (most changes take effect in July). Updated 2014 **Note** Be sure to print/ view State of Florida's Recreational Fishing Regulations for bag/size limits (Scan QR code attached on Everglades Fishing Regulation).           Protect yourself, protect the reef! As a visitor to the park and the reefs, you can reduce the risk of harming coral by taking a more "reef friendly" approach to sun protection.             West Nile Virus
